message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave you with 10%, but we can work it out as we go.
That's a very generous offer Alice, but how about a 60/40 split? It accounts for the time pressure we both face.
I'm willing to give up a bit more, but I think 80/20 is still a reasonable split.  We're running out of time, so let's be realistic.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  The clock is ticking!
